definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

pinyin: Sha1 te4 A1 la1 bo2 ren2

sentences.english: China has accused Saudi Arabia of dumping petrochemicals on its markets.
sentences.chinese: 中国指责沙特在中国市场上倾销石油化工产品。

sentences.english: She continued on to Riyadh and Jeddah in Saudi Arabia.
sentences.chinese: 接着，她先后访问了沙特阿拉伯的利雅得和吉达。

sentences.english: Bin Laden daughter hides in Saudi embassy in Iran.
sentences.chinese: 拉登女儿摆脱伊朗软禁，躲入沙特大使馆。

sentences.english: In the end, a substantial transfer from Saudi Arabia closed the gap.
sentences.chinese: 最终，由沙特阿拉伯划拨的大量资金弥补了这一差额。

sentences.english: Although China and Saudi is thousands of kilometers away, the people in both countries have intercourse since long ago.
sentences.chinese: 中国和沙特虽相距数千公里，但两国人民早有来往。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia is the second leg of Hu's current five-nation tour.
sentences.chinese: 沙特是胡锦涛此次五国之行的第二站。

sentences.english: There existed at the Chatelet in Paris a large and long cellar.
sentences.chinese: 从前在巴黎的小沙特雷，有个长长的大地牢。

sentences.english: The turning point in Saudi policy came in the spring of 2002.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯政策的转折点是2002年春天。

sentences.english: The Saudi intent to thwart Iran's regional ambitions is clearest in Lebanon.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阻遏伊朗地区野心的意图在黎巴嫩最为明显。

sentences.english: This is the "Saudi Eagle" first visit to Europe.
sentences.chinese: 此次是“沙特之鹰”首度访问欧洲。

sentences.english: China has overtaken US by importing record oil from Saudia arabia.
sentences.chinese: 中国从沙特进口的石油创下记录，超过了美国。

sentences.english: Mr al Rouki has become a focus of attention now in the Saudi press.
sentences.chinese: 塔拉尔已经成为沙特媒体关注的焦点。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabian officials have not responded to the shootdown claim.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯官员没有对直升机被击落的说法做出回应。

sentences.english: He said that the China Pavilion and Saudi Arabia Pavilion might reopen together.
sentences.chinese: 钱之广表示，中国馆将可能实现与沙特馆的联动开放。

sentences.english: On March 11, Saudi Consulate in Karachi who have been attacked two grenades.
sentences.chinese: 本月11日，沙特驻卡拉奇领馆曾遭两枚手榴弹袭击。

sentences.english: Saudi Arabia tipped off U.S. intelligence about the parcels.
sentences.chinese: 沙特阿拉伯向美国情报部门通报了包裹的可疑之处。

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯联合酋长国
nations of the Persian Gulf/Gulf states
